participant_1.background:
I do not see my family very often, but I am close to them.
My spouse is a software engineer and my child is a preschooler.
i have 2 sisters.
I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities.
i like classic radio programs.

participant_2.background:
I overanalyze things and dwell on small mistakes.
my parents live across the street from me.
I'm going to a local Christmas concert with my friend, even though I can't sing very well.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
i love to tell jokes.

content.text: Hello! How is your evening going?
Evening is going well, thank you! Just got home from a long day at work, and now I'm getting ready to relax and watch some TV.
Nice! Are you looking forward to any upcoming events?
I'm going to a Christmas concert with a friend of mine this weekend, so I'm really looking forward to that!
Ooh, that sounds fun! I hope you have a great time.
Thanks, I'm sure I will! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, and I'm always trying new recipes. I also love to watch classic radio programs.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to cook, but I'm not very good at it.
It's not as hard as you think! There are a lot of great recipes online that are easy to follow.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime. I love to eat, so I'm sure I'd get pretty good at it quickly!
I'm sure you would! And it's always more fun to cook when you have someone to share it with.
That's true! I'll have to invite you over for dinner sometime.
Great! We'll have to make it a Christmas party.
That sounds like a great idea!
I'm so glad I met you! You seem really cool.
Thanks, you too! I'm glad we're friends.
